/wiki/Chumphon_Province: Chumphon (Thai: ชุมพร pronounced [t͡ɕʰūm.pʰɔ̄ːn], Southern Thai: ชุมพร pronounced [cʰum.pʰɔ̄ːn]) is a southern province (changwat) of Thailand on the Gulf of Thailand. Neighbouring provinces are Prachuap Khiri Khan, Surat Thani, and Ranong. To the west it borders the Burmese province of Tanintharyi.
/wiki/Pathio_District:
Pathio (Thai: ปะทิว, pronounced [pā.tʰīw]) is a district (amphoe) in the northern part of 
Chumphon Province, southern Thailand. The province's main airport, Chumphon Airport is in Pathio. Pathio has alternate English spellings, Pathiu and Pathiew.
